name: Ironhold
description: A massive fortress city carved into the side of a mountain, headquarters of the Order of the Shield.
image_prompt_positive: Massive stone fortress carved into mountain, snow-capped peaks, iron gates, banners, defensive walls, soldier patrols, cold atmosphere, epic scale, 8k
image_prompt_negative: forest, beach, warm, sunny, wooden buildings, ruins
narrative: Carved directly into the granite face of the Northern Peaks, Ironhold is a testament to dwarven endurance and human ingenuity. It serves as the unyielding headquarters of the Order of the Shield. Massive iron gates, reinforced with defensive runes, bar entry to all but the authorized. Inside, the city is a vertical marvel of stone bridges, foundries, and barracks, constantly echoing with the ring of hammers on anvils.

points_of_interest.name: The Forge
points_of_interest.description: The heart of the city, a massive foundry where weapons and armor are crafted day and night using volcanic heat.
points_of_interest.image_prompt: Giant forge, lava, blacksmiths, anvils, fire, industrial fantasy

points_of_interest.name: High Command
points_of_interest.description: The headquarters of the Order of the Shield, strictly guarded and imposing.

points_of_interest.name: The Ramparts
points_of_interest.description: The outer walls offering a view of the snowy peaks and the valleys below.
